00024         CScriptModule::CScriptModule(const char *name)
00025                 : mName(name)
00026         {
00027         #ifdef PYTHON31
00028                 // Fill module defs
00029                 PyModuleDef moduledef = { PyModuleDef_HEAD_INIT, name, 0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00030                 mPyModuleDef = moduledef;
00031 
00032                 // Init underlying Py module
00033                 mPyModule = PyModule_Create(&mPyModuleDef);
00034                 PyDict_SetItemString(PyImport_GetModuleDict(), name, mPyModule);
00035                 mPyModuleDict = PyModule_GetDict(mPyModule);
00036                 mPyModuleName = PyUnicode_FromString(name);
00037         #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00038                 mPyModule = Py_InitModule(name, 0);
00039                 mPyModuleDict = PyModule_GetDict(mPyModule);
00040                 mPyModuleName = PyString_FromString(name);
00041         #endif
00042         }

00046         CScriptModule::~CScriptModule()
00047         {
00048                 TExportMap::iterator it = mEntries.begin();
00049                 while(it != mEntries.end())
00050                 {
00051                         delete it->second;
00052                         ++it;
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 for(size_t i = 0; i != mAttributeStorage.size(); ++i)
00056                 {
00057                         delete[] mAttributeStorage[i];
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 Py_DECREF(mPyModuleName);
00061         }

00086         ExportEntry* CScriptModule::ExportType(const user_type *type)
00087         {
00088                 if(T_ENUM != type->tag())
00089                 {
00090                         ExportEntry* ent = CreateClassObject(type);
00091 
00092                         if(ent)
00093                         {
00094                                 int res = PyModule_AddObject(mPyModule, ent->Name, (PyObject*)&ent->ClassObj);
00095                                 ASSERT_STRICT(res == 0);
00096                         }
00097                         return ent;
00098                 }
00099                 else
00100                 {
00101                         for(user_type::member_iterator it = type->members_begin(),
00102                                 end = type->members_end();
00103                                 it != end; ++it)
00104                         {
00105                                 if(!it.is<enumeration>())
00106                                         continue;
00107                                 enumeration e = it.get<enumeration>();
00108 
00109                                 int ret = PyModule_AddIntConstant(mPyModule, e.get_name(), e.get_value());
00110                                 ASSERT_STRICT(ret == 0);
00111                         }
00112                         return 0;
00113                 }
00114         }

00118         ExportEntry* CScriptModule::FindExportedType(const char* typeName) const
00119         {
00120                 TExportMap::const_iterator it = mEntries.find(typeName);
00121                 return it == mEntries.end() ? 0 : it->second;
00122         }

00125 
00126         ExportEntry* CScriptModule::CreateClassObject(const user_type *type)
00127         {
00128                 ExportEntry* base_class = 0;
00129 
00130                 // TODO: Support multiple base classes
00131                 for(type::attribute_iterator it = type->attributes_begin(),
00132                         end = type->attributes_end();
00133                         it != end; ++it)
00134                 {
00135                         if(it->get_type() != ATTR_BASE_TYPE)
00136                                 continue;
00137                         const base_type* bta = static_cast<const base_type*>(&*it);
00138                         const user_type* base = &bta->get_base();
00139 
00140                         // Check if exist (using hint for in-module lookup)
00141                         THintMap::const_iterator fnd = mHintMap.find(base);
00142                         if(fnd == mHintMap.end())
00143                                 base_class = ExportType(base);
00144                         else
00145                                 base_class = fnd->second;
00146                 }
00147 
00148                 ExportEntry* ent = CreateClass(type, base_class);
00149 
00150                 AddMethods(type, ent);
00151 
00152                 return ent;
00153         }
00154 
00156 
00157         ExportEntry* CScriptModule::CreateClass(const user_type* type, ExportEntry* base_class)
00158         {
00159                 ExportEntry* ent = new ExportEntry;
00160                 strncpy(ent->Name, type->name(), _EntNameBufLen);
00161                 //type->FullName(ent->FullName, _EntNameBufLen);
00162                 ent->Type = type;
00163                 ent->Module = this;
00164                 ent->BaseType = base_class;
00165 
00166                 ent->ClassObj.tp_name           = ent->Name;
00167                 ent->ClassObj.tp_basicsize      = sizeof(InstanceObject);
00168                 ent->ClassObj.tp_dictoffset     = offsetof(InstanceObject, inst_dictionary);
00169                 ent->ClassObj.tp_flags          = Py_TPFLAGS_DEFAULT | Py_TPFLAGS_BASETYPE;
00170                 ent->ClassObj.tp_new            = &CScriptManager::callback_new;
00171                 ent->ClassObj.tp_init           = &CScriptManager::callback_init;
00172                 ent->ClassObj.tp_dealloc        = &CScriptManager::callback_dealloc;
00173                 ent->ClassObj.tp_base           = base_class ? &base_class->ClassObj : 0;
00174                 ent->ClassObj.tp_getattro       = &PyObject_GenericGetAttr;
00175                 ent->ClassObj.tp_setattro       = &PyObject_GenericSetAttr;
00176                 ent->ClassObj.tp_getset         = CreateAttributes(type);
00177                 ent->ClassObj.tp_str            = &CScriptManager::callback_tostring;
00178                 ent->ClassObj.tp_richcompare= &CScriptManager::callback_richcompare;
00179                 ent->ClassObj.tp_hash           = &CScriptManager::callback_hash;
00180 
00181                 Py_INCREF(&ent->ClassObj);
00182 
00183                 // Ready the type
00184                 if (PyType_Ready(&ent->ClassObj) < 0)
00185                 {
00186                         delete ent;
00187                         return 0;
00188                 }
00189 
00190                 //mEntries.insert(std::make_pair(ent->FullName, ent));
00191                 mEntries.insert(std::make_pair(ent->Name, ent));
00192                 mHintMap.insert(std::make_pair(ent->Type, ent));
00193 
00194                 return ent;
00195         }

00198 
00199         void CScriptModule::AddMethods(const user_type* type, ExportEntry* entry)
00200         {
00201                 for(user_type::member_iterator it = type->members_begin(),
00202                         end = type->members_end();
00203                         it != end; ++it)
00204                 {
00205                         if(!it.is<method>())
00206                                 continue;
00207                         const method_member* method = static_cast<const method_member*>(&*it);
00208                         PyObject* self = PyLong_FromSize_t(reinterpret_cast<size_t>(method));
00209                         CreateMethod(method->get_name(), entry->ClassObj.tp_dict, self, CScriptManager::callback_invoke);
00210                         Py_DECREF(self);
00211                 }
00212         }
00213 
00215 
00216         void CScriptModule::CreateMethod( const char* name,
00217                                                                           PyObject* dictionary,
00218                                                                           PyObject* self,
00219                                                                           PyCFunction handler,
00220                                                                           const char* docString /*= 0*/ )
00221         {
00222                 PyMethodDef def = { name, handler, METH_VARARGS, docString };
00223                 mMethodDefStorage.push_back(def);
00224 
00225                 PyObject *func = PyCFunction_New(&mMethodDefStorage.back(), self);
00226         #ifdef PYTHON31
00227                 PyObject *method = PyInstanceMethod_New(func);
00228         #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00229                 PyObject *method = PyMethod_New(func, 0, 0);
00230         #endif
00231                 PyDict_SetItemString(dictionary, name, method);
00232 
00233                 Py_DECREF(func);
00234                 Py_DECREF(method);
00235         }

00239         PyGetSetDef* CScriptModule::CreateAttributes(const user_type* type)
00240         {
00241                 size_t nAccessors = 0;
00242                 for(user_type::member_iterator it = type->members_begin(),
00243                         end = type->members_end();
00244                         it != end; ++it)
00245                 {
00246                         if(it.is<accessor>())
00247                                 ++nAccessors;
00248                 }
00249 
00250                 if(!nAccessors)
00251                         return 0;
00252 
00253                 PyGetSetDef* attrs = new PyGetSetDef[nAccessors + 1];
00254                 memset(attrs, 0, sizeof(PyGetSetDef) * (nAccessors + 1));
00255                 mAttributeStorage.push_back(attrs);
00256 
00257                 size_t i = 0;
00258                 for(user_type::member_iterator it = type->members_begin(),
00259                         end = type->members_end();
00260                         it != end; ++it)
00261                 {
00262                         if(!it.is<accessor>())
00263                                 continue;
00264                         const accessor_member* method = static_cast<const accessor_member*>(&*it);
00265                         FillAttributeDesc(attrs[i], method);
00266                         ++i;
00267                 }
00268 
00269                 return attrs;
00270         }
00271 
00273 
00274         void CScriptModule::FillAttributeDesc(PyGetSetDef& def, const accessor_member* acc)
00275         {
00276                 def.name = (char*)acc->get_name();
00277                 //def.doc = (char*)data->getDocString();
00278                 def.get = &CScriptManager::callback_attribute_get;
00279                 def.set = &CScriptManager::callback_attribute_set;
00280                 def.closure = (void*)acc;
00281         }

00285         bool CScriptModule::ExportVariable(const char* varName, PyObject* pyvalue)
00286         {
00287                 int ret = PyModule_AddObject(mPyModule, varName, pyvalue);
00288                 ASSERT_STRICT(ret != -1);
00289                 return ret == 0;
00290         }
